Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

Since .16 was released I sent 2 rockets to the mun, the firs one was a fail, the second was perfect. But staying on subject I want to show you some eclipses that are happening in my KSP right now...

From left: Jebediah Kerman, Bill Kerman. (Bob is not there because his 2 mean brothers threw him out to orbit the mun, he is now orbiting kerbin...)

This is the 3 moon eclipse, the moons are lined in one straight line (Kind of). That\'s why there is a kerbin eclipse. (Unfortunately I haven\'t got a rocket landed on the other side of Kerbin to see the lunar eclipse.

And this is the view from an angle, and you can see Bob orbiting Kerbin, I am planning to save him in a few days...

So tell me what you think about this! ;P

'...in a few days..'

lol

Looks pretty awesome though, just by luck you saw it, or did you wait for it to show up?

'...in a few days..'

lol

Looks pretty awesome though, just by luck you saw it, or did you wait for it to show up?

I actually found it when I was Messing around with Bill and Jeb, I saw Kerbin near the sun so I time warped until it was dark, then I switched to the tracking station and saw that minmus was there too. I just had to take a screenshot
Ugh. I just put a satellite into orbit over the Mun and missed a Kerbin eclipse by literally five minutes irl. Too bad. Now I'm motivated to wait the additional 28 days for the next one.
